entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is mentioned as the one who pronounced himself satisfied.

entities.name: viktor krum
entities.description: Viktor Krum is introduced as a character who gets up and slouches towards Mr. Ollivander.

entities.name: mr ollivander
entities.description: Mr. Ollivander is mentioned as the one who examines the wand and talks to Viktor Krum.

entities.name: gregorovitch
entities.description: Gregorovitch is mentioned as a wand-maker by Mr. Ollivander.

relationships.description: Viktor Krum talks to Mr. Ollivander about the wand.
Mr. Ollivander examines the wand of Viktor Krum.
